name: Sonic XN
short_description: Sonic XN, an open source Sonic the Hedgehog fan game, aims to bring a quality Open Source 3D Sonic game to the masses.  Based off of the Sauerbraten Game Engine (http://www.sauerbraten.org/), the game will be highly modifiable.
